function.name: new_vector
function.brief: Creates and returns a pointer to a new kld_vector_t

return.doc: a pointer to a new kld_vector_t

function.name: vector_append
function.brief: Appends the passed in **data** to vector **v**.

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the kld_vector_t in which to insert the **data**.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the data in which to append into kld_vector_t **v**.

function.name: vector_get
function.brief: Returns the data stored at the index **i** inside of kld_vector_t **v**.

return.doc: the data stored at index **i** of kld_vector_t **v** passed in.

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the kld_vector_t in which to get data.

argument.name: i
argument.doc: the index of the kld_vector_t in which to get data.

function.name: vector_insert_at
function.brief: Inserts the passed in **data** at index **i** in vector **v**.

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the kld_vector_t in which to insert the **data**.

argument.name: i
argument.doc: the index in which to insert into kld_vector_t **v**.

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the data in which to insert into kld_vector_t **v**.

function.name: vector_is_empty
function.brief: Returns whether or not the vector is empty

return.doc: true if the vector has no elements or false if otherwise.

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the vector in which to check emptiness.

function.name: vector_partition
function.brief: Partitions the kld_vector_t such that all elements contained in a subarray
function.doc: defined by bounds **left** and **right** that are less than or equal to the element at the **pivot** index are to the left of the **pivot** index and all the elements greater than the element at the **pivot** index are to the right of the **pivot** index.

function.name: vector_quicksort
function.brief: Sorts the elements of the kld_vector_t by the means of the quicksort algorithm. Asserts that vector data comparable by using the < operator.

function.name: vector_remove_at
function.brief: Removes the passed in **data** at index **i** in vector **v**.

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the kld_vector_t in which to remove the **data**.

argument.name: i
argument.doc: the index in which to remove into kld_vector_t **v**.

function.name: vector_set
function.brief: Sets the data of a vector element at index **i**

argument.name: i
argument.doc: the index in which to set the data

argument.name: data
argument.doc: the new data to set at element **i** inside of kld_vector_t **v**

function.name: vector_swap
function.brief: Swaps the element at index **i** with the element at index **j** inside of the kld_vector_t **v**

argument.name: v
argument.doc: the kld_vector_t in which to swap the elements

argument.name: i
argument.doc: the index **i** in which to swap elements inside of the kld_vector_t

argument.name: j
argument.doc: the index **j** in which to swap elements inside of the kld_vector_t
